SLIGHTLY LESS ABSOLUTELY NOT FINISHED

USA Rank I - III Mostly Historical Sights

I went with a way too early release (definitely not rushed because I saw RastMust's post on all tank sights). Anyways here are the tank sights I've been working on for a lil while.

Update 1
Added M4, M4A1, and M4A2 sights.

I used this website as a source: http://afvdatabase.com/index.html
Yes it is in HTTP but it helped a lot. Also because I have no idea where everyone else found their sources, I stuck to this one.

I also want to recommend Weapon...

#anime #eighty_six #86
English-
When it comes to eighty six, I made a famous FelDress, that's called Juggernaut. It took a long time to make it, so it was annoying.

한국어-
에이티식스 하면 유명한 펠드레스인 저거노트 조준경을 만들어 보았습니다. 만들는데 머리쫌 쓰고 올리는데 귀찮니즘이 발병하여;; 이렇게 늦게마나 올립니다.

Very clean and nice sight useful fore those who want to do precision aiming, easy to use with either laser rangefinder on a modern tank or some estimate rangefinder on a pre-WW2 tank :)

Here it is, the ultimate sight pack. All historical, semi-historical and realistic sights in one pack. This pack does not contain all the vehicles in WarThunder simply because there aren't any historical sights for them all. Share with your friends!

【Personal Sight for all tanks】
-Redeploy the rangefinder and the current ruler distance position
-The maximum ruler set 16 kilometers (actual display depends on the type of gun and shell)
-Remove the lower half of the crosshair for long-range sniping without being blocked by the line

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Simple Yak-3/7/9 gunsight pack that works with all nose-guns from MG to 45mm. Intended for use around 600m

Install by unzipping included UserSkins folder to your WarThunder root directory and combining it with any existing folder.

also if you want different image then il make it again!

Sight with Waguri Kaoruko from "Kaoru hana wa rin to saku" manga
I made it using the TurboWarp browser program.
It is an universal sight so you can use it on any tanks

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION:
1. Download the Zip-file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the folder Usersights and paste the unzipped file into the folder All Tanks.
3. Launch the game. Enter Options > Common Battle Settings > Use alternative sight grid and choose "waguri".
4. Enjoy!

If the Usersights folder is not displayed in the root folder of the game, you could create one by yourself

#anim...

Universal sight with the best girl of gf
#anime #girls_frontline #hk416

Anti air sight for all non radar anti air and roof mounted MG.
Use small circle lead for slow plane / bomber plane (±300 km/h), like Il-2, Bf110, etc.
Use big circle lead for fast plane / fighter plane (±500 km/h), like P-51 Mustang, Me-262, etc.

Practice in test drive or custom battle with bot for better aim.
If plane 1000m away, set your zeroing distance to 250m or 500m.
All sights has been adjusted to every anti air shell velocity.
Hit guaranteed.

*Update 27/07/24: added advanced sight and simple sight*
*Next update: AA sight for howitzer with proximity fuse shell.*

As requested (because I don't make too many Russian things), cannon and rocket sight for the Su-6 (all models). Separate sights are available for using just the 37mm's, or using them in conjunction with the RBS-82, RBS-132, or M13UK rockets. Ensure that your IAS is above 350kmh for a proper run with any weapons. For ...

Chinese 85mm guns sight ，modified for ammo type localization and few Chinese new ammo type compare to origin soviet 85mm including type 56 HEATFS ，sights are based on work of #PotatoChips especially the T-44 scope and thanks him for working on the whole USSR tech tree ，although ，coxial gun of ZTQ62 、Obj211、ZTS-63-I、ZTS-63 1980 and DJW-85 of ZTS-63 1980 is unsure why unable to work so this set is still WIP(altough mostly modify based on other authors thanks to #PotatoChips,#Rastmust,#RideR2 and #Caff_) , sorry about using other authors' work ,

Русский православный крест.

Подходит для всех танков.

Установка: распаковать архив, переместить файл .bkl в папку War Thunder/UserSights/all_tanks

Sight with MDR from Girls Frontline.
It was made in the TurboWarp browser program.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION:
1. Download the Zip-file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the folder Usersights and paste the unzipped file into the folder All Tanks.
3. Launch the game. Enter Options > Common Battle Settings > Use alternative sight grid and choose MDR_chibi. Repeat 3rd step choosing all tanks one by one in hangar to set the sight to every tank.
4. Enjoy!

If the Usersights folder is not displayed in the root folder of the game, then follow the third step from the in...
